verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. O <S%H8628>clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hands<s%>, all ye <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H7321>shout<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>triumph<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> most <S%H5945>high<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible<s%>; he is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He shall <S%H1696>subdue<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> under us, and the <S%H3816>nations<s%> under our <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
He shall <S%H977>choose<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us, the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> whom he <S%H157>loved<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H430>God<s%> is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> with a <S%H8643>shout<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%>: sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto our <S%H4428>King<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%>.
For <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: sing ye <S%H2167>praises<s%> with <S%H7919>understanding<s%>.
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%> over the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>.

The <S%H5081>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, even the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>: for the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> belong unto <S%H430>God<s%>: he is <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H5927>exalted<s%>.
